content: the north shore headband is a clean unisex colourwork design featuring simple stripes and a comfortable fit an approachable project that results in a warm practical accessory you ll reach for all winter skills / construction a great first stranded colourwork project worked in the round with simple stripes and ribbing size one size 20-inch circumference and 5 inches high yarn used istex léttlopi - worsted weight yarn 1x 50g 9420 navy blue 1x 50g 0051 white 1x 50g 1412 pink heather needle + accessories 5mm circular needles knitted on 16inch cable stitch markers tapestry needle
